name: Chaotic Army
description:
Welcome to Chaotic Army! This is an action-packed arcade game where your only premise is to try and be the last one standing. But doing that is not going to be a walk in the park.

Chaotic Army has a large player base that wants to reach the top score and stay alive until the end of the match. All you have to do is to train, become better than the others and claim your name as the best champion that ever existed.

Exciting arcade shooting gameplay
What makes Chaotic Army unique is that it all relies on your skill. Chaotic Army has platforming elements, but at the same time you also need to learn how to shoot and target your enemies. 

Every detail is impressive here and the game is overly responsive and a lot of fun to explore. What makes it great is that you always push the boundaries and come up with new ways to become better and better at the game.

Lots of characters to choose from
Chaotic Army brings in many animal themed characters that you can play as. You have pigs, crocodiles and many other animals and you can easily enjoy the funny and quirky gameplay, unique moments you spend here and just the sheer fun that comes from all of this. 

You can feel free to choose any of the animals, each one has its own gun and stats, so be careful what you choose and how you get it.

Play with randoms or bots
The game can be played online, but you can also play with bots if you want. You need to be number 1 as you try to eliminate all the other enemies. In case a session can’t be filled, you will automatically start playing against bots. That’s very exciting, because it brings in new and creative challenges to explore every time. 
Test your shooting and platforming skills in one of the coolest and most interesting arcade games out there. Start playing Chaotic Army today and have fun exploring new mechanics and trying out creative ideas all the time. Give it a shot right away and you will start enjoying this more and more every time. With tons of players, unique characters and powerful gun play, Chaotic Army gives you the coolest game experience you always wanted.

Features:
• Intense, action-packed game experiences
• Beautiful pixel art and cool music
• One of a kind game mechanics
• Numerous characters to choose from
